description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) adds a temporary additional train trip
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 高速鐵路(香港段) 加開臨時列車車次

2025-07-04T10:16:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) will add the following temporary additional train trips: From Guangzhounan Station to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station - July 12: Train G9793 Tickets are available for purchase through the 12306 official website (12306. cn/en/), mobile app, or appointed travel agents. For train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn/en/) or mobile app, High Speed Rail website or mobile app.
2025-07-04T10:16:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，高速鐵路(香港段)將加開以下臨時車次： 由廣州南站前往香港西九龍站 -7月12日:G9793 你可透過12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式、指定代理或前往香港西九龍站購買新增列車車票。 有關列車服務詳情，請瀏覽12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式、高速鐵路網頁及手機應用程式。
